title: Toda Lattice Models with Boundary
abstract: We consider the soliton solutions in 1- and (1+1)-dimensional Toda lattice models with a boundary. We make use of the solutions already known on a full line by means of the Hirota's method. We explicitly construct the solutions satisfying the boundary conditions. The ${\bf Z}_{\infty}$-symmetric boundary condition can be introduced by the two-soliton solutions naturally.
